price: 30 n’ayant de rapports qu’avec leurs épouses ou leurs esclaves[1477], auquel cas ils ne sauraient être blâmés,
arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُومِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: illā ʿalā azwājihim aw mā malakat aymānuhum fa-innahum ghayru malūmīna
